00032 template< typename T >
00033 class const_memory1d {
00034         public:
00039                 typedef std::size_t size_type;
00040 
00045                 typedef T value_type;
00046 
00047 
00053                 CUPP_HOST CUPP_DEVICE
00054                 size_type size() const;
00055 
00056 
00063                 CUPP_DEVICE
00064                 T const& operator[]( size_type index ) const;
00065 
00066         private:
00070                 T* device_pointer_;
00071 
00075                 size_type size_;
00076 }; // class memory1d
00077 
00078 template <typename T>
00079 T const& const_memory1d<T>::operator[](size_type index) const {
00080         return device_pointer_[index];
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 template <typename T>
00085 typename const_memory1d<T>::size_type const_memory1d<T>::size() const {
00086         return size_;
00087 }
